title: One for all is absolutely the best rotating game mode.
body:
Ive never had so much fun in league xD

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EF1UsP3_TJQ

replies.body: I actually like the new Definitely Not Dominion mode a lot, as well as Ascension.... maybe I just like circular maps?
Ascension is my favorite! DND is my least :( This last round of One For All was really toxic whenever I tried to play so idk about it lol
What do you think of Urf?
URF is fun but I'm a Maokai troll on it lol
At least you're not evelynn. Impossible to deal with.
You know, Ive never understood ascension, which really puts me off from trying it xD  I do miss dominion tho :(
Definitely Not Dominion is my favorite by far

> [{quoted}](name=Koalifier,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=yyQp5VTz,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-06-22T19:57:15.712+0000)
>
> I actually like the new Definitely Not Dominion mode a lot, as well as Ascension.... maybe I just like circular maps?

I enjoy all the special game modes, would love it if it was at least available in custom mode if not just more often and longer
Brand in one for all is the cheapest thing ever. Oh a team fight, lets all just toss around our ultimates and watch everyone die. Not to mention everyone gets stunned. Thats why I always ban it.
Its very... very... broken xD I felt so dirty after playing him and Illiaoi
Thats why I always pick stupid champs to play in it. Like Urgot or Soraka xD Very fun champs in there
Yeah, this video just showed the nasty plays that happened with slightly more broken champs, I played probably 50-60 games of OFA this time around.
watching that trundle fight had to be the most disgusting thing i've ever seen in my life

FILTHY right? xD we actually lost that game, VERY hard after that moment.

TUrns out if 5 trundles all q you, they STEAL 125 AD, + 5 ults makes them unstoppable xD
One for all is probably the least played mode because it is boring AF. I am hoping Riot realizes this and takes it out of the rotation.
